original_text: And Zedekiah king of Judah and his princes will I give into the hand of their enemies, and into the hand of them that seek their life, and into the hand of the king of Babylon's army, which are gone up from you.
korean_text: 또 내가 유다의 시드기야 왕과 그의 고관들을 그의 원수의 손과 그의 생명을 찾는 자의 손과 너희에게서 떠나간 바벨론 왕의 군대의 손에 넘기리라

sentences.original_text: will I give into the hand of their enemies
and into the hand of them that seek their life
and into the hand of the king of Babylon's army
which are gone up from you
